page.title: 01Town Serves the Countryside
page.content: The block is flat fernland with few trees and is surrounded by Fen drainage Over 1/3 of the block is residential with the town centre of Spalding. It is a market town, brisk, open, friendly and comercial. A number of residents work in horticulture, agriculture and the food processing industry. Others leave the block to work while some have come to retire in the block. The area is famous for its bulb industry and bulb and local produce auctions are held regularly. Easily 1/4 million people from all over the country flock to town in May for the annual Tullip Time Festival to see the parade of flowerdecorated floats & to follow the rural ride The gentlemans Sociey still flourishes, founded in 1710 by the then owner of Ayscoughfee Hall which now belongs to the town and is currently preparing
